precision_questions.specification_clarity: What specific units, thresholds, and validation procedures are defined?
precision_questions.edge_case_coverage: What boundary conditions and error scenarios are addressed?
precision_questions.resource_bounds: What are the explicit memory, time, and processing limits?
precision_questions.failure_modes: What happens when each component fails or reaches capacity?
precision_questions.measurement_precision: How are success criteria quantified and verified?

mandatory_validations.threshold_definitions: All thresholds must include specific units and ranges
mandatory_validations.resource_limits: All processes must have explicit bounds and timeouts
mandatory_validations.failure_handling: All operations must define failure modes and recovery
mandatory_validations.measurement_standards: All success criteria must be quantifiable and testable
